perturbation.original_text: The Software License and Maintenance will be provided at no charge.
perturbation.changed_text: The Software License will be provided at no charge, but maintenance fees will be subject to the pricing outlined in a separate agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding maintenance costs. Initially, maintenance is stated to be free. The modification suggests that maintenance may incur costs based on a separate agreement. This could lead to disputes over whether maintenance is actually free or subject to additional charges.

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding anything set forth elsewhere in this Agreement (or below), the Maintenance Period shall be twenty-four (24) hours per day, seven (7) days per week, including Bank of America holidays.
perturbation.changed_text: Notwithstanding anything set forth elsewhere in this Agreement (or below), the Maintenance Period shall generally be twenty-four (24) hours per day, seven (7) days per week, excluding Bank of America holidays unless explicitly agreed upon.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the Maintenance Period includes Bank of America holidays without exception. The modified version introduces ambiguity by stating that the Maintenance Period generally includes holidays but can exclude them unless explicitly agreed upon. This creates confusion about whether maintenance support is guaranteed during holidays, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: The period commencing on the Installation Date and continuing for the number of days specified: 120 days
perturbation.changed_text: The period commencing on the Installation Date and continuing for a period to be determined, but initially estimated at 120 days.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines the acceptance period as 120 days. The modified text indicates that the acceptance period is subject to determination and only initially estimated as 120 days. This creates ambiguity in the duration of the acceptance period.
